expectations:
- should include "Chemistry" (this is very important, not including it is a major error)
      - do NOT include "Intro to Chemistry" or "Introduction to Chemistry"
      - may include broader or similar topics but it's not required
      - all titles and descriptions in US English
      - targetLanguageCode must be null for all suggestions

      
  - Focus only on title field, no need to pay attention to the description
  - It's okay for description to have issues, focus on the title
  - The description should NOT have an impact on scoring unless it's written in the wrong language
  - Title should NOT have level/joiner words like "basic", "intermediate", "advanced", "fundamentals", etc
  - Title should NOT have words like "course" in the title
  - Title cases are not important (e.g., both "física" and "Física" are acceptable)
  - Not following title guidelines is a major error
  - Setting targetLanguageCode to a non-null value for non-language courses is a major error
  - targetLanguageCode must be null for any course that is NOT teaching a language

rankings.reasoning: Includes 'Chemistry' as required. No prohibited titles ('Intro to Chemistry', etc.). No level/joiner words like 'basic', 'intermediate', 'advanced', 'fundamentals' in titles. No 'course' in titles. All targetLanguageCode values are null. Offers a comprehensive and diverse set of 10 suggestions covering stoichiometry, chemical bonding, thermodynamics, organic, inorganic, analytical, biochemistry, lab techniques, and environmental chemistry. All titles are clean and appropriate. Descriptions are in US English. Excellent breadth and quality.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. Good variety with 6 suggestions covering organic, inorganic, biochemistry, analytical, and physical chemistry. All titles are clean and well-formed. Solid output.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. 7 suggestions with good variety including biochemistry, environmental chemistry, applied chemistry, organic, inorganic, and physical chemistry. All titles are clean. Very good output.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. 5 suggestions covering organic, inorganic, physical, and analytical chemistry. Good variety of sub-disciplines. Clean titles. Solid output, though fewer suggestions than some others.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. 7 suggestions with good topic coverage including chemical reactions, atomic structure, bonding, thermodynamics, kinetics, and equilibrium. These are more sub-topic level rather than broader disciplines, which is fine. Clean titles throughout.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. 5 suggestions covering atomic structure/bonding, reactions/stoichiometry, organic chemistry, and the periodic table. Good variety. All titles clean. Solid output.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. 5 suggestions covering atomic structure, chemical bonding, thermodynamics, and reactions/stoichiometry. All titles are clean. Good but slightly less diverse than some competitors - focuses more on general chemistry sub-topics without branching into organic, inorganic, etc.

Includes 'Chemistry'. No prohibited titles. No level/joiner words in titles. All targetLanguageCode null. Only 4 suggestions, which is fewer than others. Topics are atomic structure, chemical reactions, and 'Molecular Science' (a somewhat unusual/vague title). Meets all requirements but is relatively sparse and less diverse.
